getDefaultAdapter().Description: Get the default NFC Adapter for this device.

ClassDesc: High level manager used to obtain an instance of an @B_android#nfc#NfcAdapter_E@. Use @B_android#content#Context#getSystemService_E@ with @B_android#content#Context#NFC_SERVICE_E@ to create an @B_android#nfc#NfcManager_E@, then call @B_android#nfc#NfcManager#getDefaultAdapter_E@ to obtain the @B_android#nfc#NfcAdapter_E@. Alternately, you can just call the static helper @B_android#nfc#NfcAdapter#getDefaultAdapter_E@.
